entry.title: Celsius Pays Off MakerDAO Debt, Moves $500M of Bitcoin to FTX
entry.summary: Celsius has repaid its DAI loan on MakerDAO and withdrawn its WBTC collateral.

entry.title: Industry Insiders Weigh In On dYdX’s Planned AppChain
entry.summary: With V4 planned on Cosmos, experts around the industry are mulling over what dYdX’s move means for the broader crypto industry.
